execution_quality: The agent attempted multiple edits to fix the rendering logic but the solution didn't resolve the underlying issue, resulting in a worse outcome (no description shown at all).
work_category: Debugging a display issue in a file change summary tool where modifications weren't rendering correctly in the output.
summary: The agent made multiple code edits attempting to fix a display rendering issue but introduced a regression that broke the feature entirely—no descriptions now appear instead of the previously buggy behavior. The fix was misaligned with the actual problem, suggesting the agent didn't fully understand the root cause before attempting corrections.
follow_up_pattern: User reports the fix made things worse, indicating they need the agent to revert or try a different approach to the problem.
